name: Screw You New Guy
description:
Walkthrough - 

Explore + Talk to Everyone!

Talk to the Ghost 

Corn can be found in the toilet.

Walk across the shelves to grab the invoice!

The Treasure is in the shed.

(NEW) Speak to the guy in space..

Talk to the girl outside of the shop then walk down and interact with the arrow!

Work in progress. Enjoy!
